short_summary: Request for Proposal for Octopus Deploy (or equivalent) Licences
description: Renewal of Octopus software licences for a period of March 31 2024 to March 30 2025.
full_summary:
### Solicitation for Octopus Deploy (or Equivalent) Licences

**Reference Number:** SSC-24-00026338:T

**Publication Date:** May 1, 2024

#### Solicitation Overview

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites you to submit a proposal for the renewal of the software license for Octopus Deploy (or an equivalent) from March 31, 2024, to March 30, 2025. 

#### Solicitation Details

* **Status:** Expired
* **Solicitation Number:** BPM021317/26338
* **Closing Date:** May 9, 2024, at 11:00 am EDT

#### Key Requirements

* The software license shall include the acknowledgement and release clauses specified in the resulting contract terms.
* Bidders must submit their proposals through the SSC P2P portal.

#### Registration and Access

To participate in this solicitation, bidders must register in the SSC P2P portal at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca) and click on the "Register Now" button.

**Important Submission Requirements**

* All bidders must attempt to submit their proposals through the P2P portal.
* Submissions are mandatory and must be made before the closing date and time.
* After the solicitation closes, the P2P system will not permit a bidder to submit a proposal.

**Additional Information**

* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada, Ontario (except NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except NCR), Canada
* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
* End User Entities: Shared Services Canada
* Contact Information:
  * Name: Sandra Ladouceur
  * Phone: 613-302-0766
  * Fax: 613-960-6026
  * Email: None
  * Address: 180 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON K1G 4A8

Please visit [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/D875DCF1-5915-4D51-8580-8B6BBB019845](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/D875DCF1-5915-4D51-8580-8B6BBB019845
